amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Notwithstanding the adoption of the motion to concur in the House amendment to S. 140 with further amendment (SA 4054 as modified), amendment SA 4054 is further modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4054 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 6. Record Vote Number: 241.

action.text: Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 4054 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S6803; text: CR S6826-6872) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4054 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 6. Record Vote Number: 241.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4054 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Thune.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4054 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 6. Record Vote Number: 241.
